Articles.Content: This thread is devoted to discussion and speculation about 0.25, but most importantly bagging yourself a seat on THE HYPEPLANE!!
Boarding now, let's see if this one gets clearance and actually takes off...
I got my passport ready. Is it true this thing goes Mach 7?

HYPEPLTRAIN!

NO!

HYPETRPLANE!

This could get a bit Gulliver's Travels if it continues.

Death to the big enders!
Ummm... There is a 0.25 discussion thread already, how about we stop making new ones.
NO! HypeTRAIN. The HypeTrain isn't clear to leave the station either. Not until after Experimentals begins. I've already taken a HypeTrain on firday for the InfoDump Hype.
Closed again, these threads are appearing way too early. 0.25 Isn't even in Experimentals yet.
